paper.title: Recognizing Safety and Liveness

author.org: IBM T.J. Watson Research Center, Yorktown Heights, USA#TAB#
Department of Computer Science, Cornell University, Ithaca, USA

paper.abstract: Formal characterizations for safety properties and liveness properties are given in terms of the structure of the Buchi automaton that specifies the property. The characterizations permit a property to be decomposed into a safety property and a liveness property whose conjunction is the original. The characterizations also give insight into techniques required to prove a large class of safety and liveness properties.
